data.query: Plan something for me in Boston on the weekend of May 19th 2025, and something on nightlife and shows

expected_intermediate_agent_responses.author: location_search_agent
expected_intermediate_agent_responses.text: Here are a few ideas for a fun date weekend in Boston focused on nightlife and shows, with a moderate budget in mind. You can catch some laughs at a comedy club, enjoy live music, and experience the vibrant atmosphere of a rooftop bar. This combination offers entertainment and a chance to chat and connect.
